meta.title: Raha IO - Strategy, Product, Platforms
meta.description: Bilingual studio delivering product strategy, digital platforms, and data-led experiences for ambitious teams.

hero.title: Build a calmer, smarter digital core.
hero.subtitle: Raha IO partners with growing teams to design resilient products, launch modern platforms, and align operations around insight.
hero.note: Bilingual delivery in English and Persian - Based in Tehran + Remote

pillars.title: Strategy Sprints
pillars.desc: Vision, roadmap, and business alignment in 2-3 weeks.

pillars.title: Platform Builds

about.title: A company built for clarity
about.body: We are a small, senior team of strategists, designers, and engineers. We work alongside founders and operators to turn complex challenges into confident releases.
highlights: Product design systems that stay consistent
Engineering handoff that scales beyond the first launch

services.title: What we do
services.subtitle: End-to-end delivery for teams who need focus, speed, and quality.

items.title: Product Strategy

items.title: Digital Platforms
items.desc: Web apps, portals, and branded experiences.

steps.title: Align
steps.desc: Define the north star, outcomes, and constraints.

steps.title: Design

steps.title: Deliver
steps.desc: Build, launch, and support your team post-release.

testimonial.quote: Raha translated complexity into a platform our teams could finally scale. The delivery felt calm, thoughtful, and fast.
testimonial.name: Lina Moradi

contact.title: Let's build the next chapter
